Item.name: Bubble Berry Jam
Item.description: Tasty jam made out of bubble berries. Known to quench a bit of thirst.

Item.name: Pomegrenade Jam
Item.description: Tasty jam made out of pomegrenade. Known to be a bit more filling.

Item.name: Sea Weed Strip
Item.description: Sea weed pressed and sliced. Let it dry into Nori.

Item.name: Nori
Item.description: Dried and prepared sea weed used for sushi.

Item.name: Canned Tomatoes
Item.description: A rare can of tomatoes back from when supplies were still delivered from earth! High in value, these ingredients are used exclusively for delicacies these days.
